title: Species

ID.description: Unique identifier for the element, uuidv7 format

Supertype.description: The supertype category to which the element belongs.

Subtype.description: The subtype category under which the element is further classified.

Image_URL.description: URL to an image representing the element.

appearance.description: Physical description of the species, including notable features.

life_span.description: Average life expectancy of the species under natural conditions.

average_weight.description: Typical weight range for mature individuals of the species.

nourishment.description: Primary sources of food and nutrition for the species.

instincts.description: Innate behaviors and survival instincts of the species.

aggression.description: Typical level of aggressiveness exhibited by the species.

agency.description: Capacity for self-directed behavior and decision-making in the species.

languages.description: Languages known or used by the species, if any.

impact.description: Overall effect or influence the species has on its environment.

habitat.description: Primary natural habitats where the species is typically found.

interaction.description: Typical interactions of the species with other species or environmental elements.

consumables.description: Items that the species commonly consumes or utilizes.

Note: The `predators` field, marked with a `ReverseLookupAttribute` in the Unity script, is omitted from this YAML representation as it typically implies indirect relationships or derived properties that are not directly relevant for this type of schema documentation. This YAML configuration offers a detailed view into the biological, psychological, and ecological characteristics of a species, aiming to provide a comprehensive understanding of its role and dynamics within its ecosystem.
